user.biography:
Prestige watchmaking since 1775. 
Founded by Abraham-Louis Breguet, the innovator.

node.accessibility_caption: Photo by Montres Breguet on August 21, 2021. May be an image of wrist watch.

node.text:
Visible through a sapphire caseback, the bridges of the Marine Équation Marchante Tourbillon 5887 have been delicately chased to depict in meticulous detail the Royal Louis, a first rank vessel in the French Royal Navy. The barrel is adorned with a windrose motif, in reference to astronomical navigation. Thanks to the carefully chosen positioning of the oscillating weight on the rim of the calibre, the self-winding movement deploys the full splendour of its decoration. 

Discover our collections : link in bio.
#BreguetMarine #EquationofTime #ref5887 #BreguetTourbillon #Tourbillon

node.accessibility_caption: Photo by Montres Breguet on August 21, 2021. May be an image of wrist watch.
Photo by Montres Breguet on August 21, 2021. May be an image of wrist watch.
Photo by Montres Breguet on August 19, 2021. May be an image of wrist watch.

node.text:
The Marine Équation Marchante Tourbillon 5887 flaunts no less than three noteworthy complications: a Tourbillon, a perpetual calendar and the equation of time. The latter is among the rarest and most fascinating in watchmaking. It serves to display the difference between mean solar time, corresponding to civil or standard hours and minutes, and true solar time, meaning the actual solar hours and minutes.

Discover our collections : link in bio.
#BreguetMarine #EquationofTime #ref5887 #BreguetTourbillon #Tourbillon

node.accessibility_caption: Photo by Montres Breguet on August 17, 2021.

node.text:
The requirements for fine anglage are strict. Notwithstanding the varying shapes of the components edges, the rounding should be even throughout. Irregularities, flat spots, distortion of curves are all unacceptable. Most of all the edges should display a clean bright polish, done in a way to maximise brilliance. Considered by anyone else to be a complex finish to achieve, although commonly recognised, anglage has been raised to the rank of an art form at Breguet.

Learn more : link in bio.
#Anglage #Craftmanship #BreguetWatchmaking

node.accessibility_caption: Photo by Montres Breguet on August 17, 2021.

node.text:
There are many challenges in creating a perfect anglage finish, even with the simplest of forms, but increase geometrically as the shape of the component becomes more complex. Consider for a moment the panoply of shapes at the disposal of watchmakers as they craft the bridges, plates, cams and levers of different movements: straight edges, sharp exterior corners, rounded bombée edges, sharp interior corners. The palate is essentially endless, limited only by the imaginations of the movement designers. 
Learn more : link in bio
#Anglage #Craftmanship #BreguetWatchmaking

node.accessibility_caption: Photo by Montres Breguet on August 12, 2021.

node.text:
Anglage is one of the most exacting and intricate finishes to apply. The description sounds simple: rounding and polishing the edge of a movement bridge or other component. There are multiple purposes that underlie application of anglage. First and foremost is the elimination of smudges and burs remaining after a part has been machined. Not only are these "left overs" from the cutting of the component unappealing in appearance, they are prime sites for corrosion to begin.
Learn more : link in bio.
#Anglage #Craftmanship #BreguetWatchmaking

node.text:
The Héritage Grande Date 5410 model houses calibre 516GG, a movement endowed with the technological innovations in the field of materials achieved by Breguet over the past years. A silicon balance-spring notably enhances the model’s performance, ensuring exceptional precision and reliability. 
#BreguetHéritage #GrandeDate #ref5410

node.accessibility_caption: Photo by Montres Breguet on August 06, 2021. May be an image of wrist watch.

node.text:
The Héritage 5410 features the keenly appreciated date indication enthroned at 12 o’clock, which enlivens on a finely crafted silvered gold face reflecting the double curvature of the case. Delicate engine-turned motifs create a wealth of structural and depth effects that both highlight and delineate the other functions of the model and thus ensure enhanced legibility. 
#BreguetHéritage #GrandeDate #ref5410

node.accessibility_caption: Photo by Montres Breguet on August 05, 2021. May be an image of wrist watch and text that says '18 BREGUET 1316'.

node.text:
The Héritage line gives a 21st century twist to a classic repertoire. Curved along two axes in a "tonneau" or barrel shape ensuring a perfect fit on the wrist, Héritage timepieces are the epitome of technical mastery.
#BreguetHéritage #GrandeDate #ref5410

node.accessibility_caption: Photo by Montres Breguet on August 03, 2021. May be an image of wrist watch.

node.text:
Breguet designed a peripheral rotor in platinum, winding in both directions of spin, to ensure the movement of the Classique Tourbillon Extra-Plat Automatique 5377 boasts a thickness of just 3 mm in a 7 mm-high case. Richly decorated, the caseback offers a spectacular view of its Tourbillon.
Learn more about the Tourbillon : link in bio.
#BreguetClassique #ref5377 #BreguetTourbillon #Tourbillon

node.accessibility_caption: Photo by Montres Breguet on August 03, 2021. May be an image of wrist watch.
Photo by Montres Breguet on August 03, 2021. May be an image of wrist watch.
Photo by Montres Breguet on July 31, 2021. May be an image of wrist watch.

node.text:
The stylistic features of the Classique Tourbillon Extra-Plat Automatique 5377’s dial include varying engine-turned patterns, executed by hand as a mark of respect for the old traditions of supreme workmanship and flawless finish. It shows off its class as a pure Breguet creation, combining timeless styling with cutting-edge technology. 
Learn more about the Tourbillon : link in bio.
#BreguetClassique #ref5377 #BreguetTourbillon #Tourbillon

Photo by Montres Breguet on July 29, 2021. May be an image of wrist watch.

node.text:
The Classique Tourbillon Extra-Plat Automatique 5377 houses one of the most spectacular horological inventions – an off-centered Tourbillon of which the lightened titanium carriage carries a Breguet balance with a silicon balance spring, as well as a specially developed escapement.
Learn more about the Tourbillon : link in bio.
#BreguetClassique #ref5377 #BreguetTourbillon #Tourbillon

node.text:
Aesthetics go hand in hand with technology here at Breguet, and the new Reine de Naples 8938 model is no exception, equipped with a self-winding mechanical movement, including an escapement and silicon balance spring. The latter comes to life all thanks to the movement of a finely engine-turned platinum rotor. 
Learn more : link in bio.
#BreguetNovelties #ReinedeNaples #QueenofNaples #ref8938
